## Navigation.routeButtons property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> - Use `routeNavItems` instead.
> 

If present the defined route buttons will be rendered in the header 'routes' slot

**Signature:**

```typescript
routeButtons: Array<{
        index: number;
        path: string;
        title: string;
        icon: string;
        variant: string;
    }>;
```
